title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Introducing the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors, the perfect solution to keep your outdoor spaces snake-free! This premium product utilizes advanced Ultrasonic technology to effectively repel snakes and a wide range of other unwanted animals.

With an emission interval of every 30 seconds, this snake repellent provides maximum coverage of up to 7000 sq. ft. Imagine enjoying your garden or patio without worrying about snakes or other critters invading your space!

The suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent is powered by solar energy, making it eco-friendly and cost-effective. The IP44 waterproof rating ensures durability and reliable performance even in harsh weather conditions.

Safety is a top priority with this product. It is safe for children and pets, and it is chemical-free, providing peace of mind for you and your loved ones.

Not only does this snake repellent effectively ward off snakes, but it also repels other animals such as deers, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels. Say goodbye to unwanted visitors in your outdoor spaces!

The suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent is easy to use. Simply charge it in the sun for 4-5 hours before use, and install it 2 inches above the soil. The sonic pulse interval of 3-4 seconds ensures continuous protection against snakes and other animals.

Don't let snakes and unwanted critters ruin your outdoor experience. Get the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors and enjoy a snake-free environment for 2-4 weeks. Order now and reclaim your outdoor spaces!
